title: Portal card
data:
{{Obsolete}} The Portal card [[teleportation|teleports]] the player: * Level 0: Controlled only if player already has teleport control. * Level 1: 50% chance of blinking immediately and 50% chance of controlled teleport. * Level 2: random blink and controlled teleport.
